name: The Crater (itch)
description:
The Crater is the first game jam submission from university student trio, Team Spicecream. Submitted for Geta Game Jam 9 with the theme Contrasting Elements we decided to make a game where nature and machines battle it out, literally.  Race your way out of the crater and slow down your enemy by destroying crumbling platforms or breaking shortcuts. 

WASD and Arrow Keys or connect 2 controllers to play.

Credits:

Nick Donaldson: Programming 

Felix Barnett: Artwork

Laurence Williams: Music and Sound
